original_text: Which was the son of Mattathias, which was the son of Amos, which was the son of Naum, which was the son of Esli, which was the son of Nagge,
korean_text: 그 위는 맛다디아요 그 위는 아모스요 그 위는 나훔이요 그 위는 에슬리요 그 위는 낙개요

sentences.original_text: Which was the son of Mattathias
which was the son of Amos
which was the son of Naum
which was the son of Esli
which was the son of Nagge
